articles.caption: A look at mobile games demographic by LoopMe
articles.title: LoopMe: 80% of mobile gamers are multitasking while playing | VentureBeat
articles.description: LoopMe surveyed over 18,000 consumers in the U.S., U.K. and Singapore to understand mobile gamers' playing habits and attention in-game.

articles.caption: A look at Gamesight comparing ad networks for PC and Console
articles.title: Gamesight compares ad networks for PC and console games | VentureBeat
articles.description: Gamesight compared the strengths of different ad networks such as Google, Twitch and TikTok for marketing PC and console games.

articles.caption: A look at mobile games demographic by LoopMe
articles.title: LoopMe: 80% of mobile gamers are multitasking while playing | VentureBeat
articles.description: LoopMe surveyed over 18,000 consumers in the U.S., U.K. and Singapore to understand mobile gamers' playing habits and attention in-game.

articles.caption: A look at 11 games that could hit $2B in rev in 2023
articles.title: 11 games are forecast to exceed $2 billion in revenue in 2023 | Pocket Gamer.biz | PGbiz
articles.description: Data.ai has revealed its predictions for 2023 in the mobile gaming market, revealing an optimistic forecast for the coming year.

articles.caption: A look at lawmakers pressing top gaming co on extremism
articles.title: U.S. lawmakers press Activision, Epic, Valve and more on extremism
articles.description: Asking game companies what they're doing about a rise of in-game hate

articles.caption: A look at Futureverse merging 8 web3 companies to create an open metaverse ecosystem
articles.title: Fewer games but greater revenue - the reality of the global mobile games market | Pocket Gamer.biz | PGbiz
articles.description: data.ai and Deconstructor of Fun break down the reality of the global games market - from releases to revenue in 2022

articles.caption: A look at Anima raising $3M for AR digital pets
articles.title: Anima raises $3M for augmented reality protocol | VentureBeat
articles.description: Anima, the protocol for dynamic and ownable augmented reality, said it raised an additional $3 million in capital.

articles.caption: A look at Death Stranding film adaptation in the works
articles.title: A Death Stranding film adaptation in the works | VentureBeat
articles.description: Hideo Kojima's Death Stranding is becoming a movie, to be produced by Kojima Productions and Hammerstone Studios.
